game.name: Monkey Kingdom Empire
game.description:
Do you love cute and lovely monkeys? Is it your hobby to become a true monkey warrior? Give Monkey Kingdom Empire game a try and be prepared to play the role of a brave monkey warrior! The situation is getting worse as a horde of enemies has attacked the kingdom. They are very cruel and have threatened to destroy all the living things in your kingdom. But, you as a courageous monkey have taken the responsibility of fighting against the dangerous snails as they are your biggest enemies in this game. 
It is not easy to get rid of these creatures as they keep crawling inconspicuously. You would surely feel for a moment that you are into a fairy tale. And, your happy ending will only be possible if you are skilled enough to survive in this brand new platform game. Your objective is to help monkey to fight against all his enemies and clear all levels. Remember no one would come to support you. Guide the monkey king to save his kingdom while fighting never before in this html5 action game!
The snail army is very big, but you also brave enough to face off them and save the world. There are four levels to choose from, including mountain, underground, sky and winter. The colorful graphics, multiple enemies including snails, birds, ducks and more will keep you busy for hours. It is easy to explore this kids adventure game in all devices including PCs, android phones, iPhones and more. Play free action-packed challenges without download and no install required.
